website_summaries.verdict: A premium twin bed frame for those who want to enjoy restful sleep night after night.
pros: Compact design is easy to fit through tight doorways and staircases
Vertical clearance of 12.5" for storage of extra blankets, pillows underneath

customer_reviews.title: Use headboard brackets to hold mattress in place!!
customer_reviews.text: I used Zinus headboard brackets to hold my mattress in place. See attached picture
customer_reviews.author: robinelledge

customer_reviews.title: Started falling apart after 3 months.  UPDATE:  Company does not respond to emails & phone calls regarding warranty.
customer_reviews.text: The welds on the middle section have separated in 3 different places after 3 months of use. Really really disappointed at poor quality of frame. UPDATE-by February 2018 the two sides had completely separated from each otther THE COMPANY DOES NOT RESPOND TO WARRANTY REQUESTS. You will see a ton of comments to negative reviews from the company stating that there is a 5 year warrant and providing email and phone number. Also, I have received no response to the phone number and email address left by the company to my original review. The 800 number goes straight to voicemail and they do not respond to email at their customer support email address.
customer_reviews.author: chiguy

customer_reviews.title: Hot glue fixed sliding problem
customer_reviews.text: I love this bed frame! I saw the other reviews about the mattress sliding and I also experienced this but I fixed it by adding a little hot glue to the slats, not gluing the mattress to the slats, but giving them some grip. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy.  Comfy.  Went together easily.  Storage space.
customer_reviews.text: Was exactly what we wanted. Can easily store tupperware clothes bins underneath. The only change I'd make is that the corners are kinda sharp. I'd rather see it have slightly rounded corners, like a mattress. I have bumped my shins a few times on the corners when the mattress shifts a little to one side. Which also brings up the issue that this thing is painted and slick, and the mattress does move around a little on the frame. If it bugs me more, I'll put some grip tape or other friction tape on the frame to keep things in place.
customer_reviews.author: Tacoma Aroma

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money or time ordering this frame
customer_reviews.text: Thought this was a good temporary replacement after my son broke his bed wooden frame. Was easy to put together but had a tendency to move a lot. Then one day it just started falling apart. Thought it was a fluke until I went on Amazon site and saw a lot of negative reviews with same issue. I was given the company's website but even after registering could not find out how to get a replacement since there is supposed to be a warranty. Disappointed in the product and the lack of service.
customer_reviews.author: Clem

customer_reviews.title: Clever design
customer_reviews.text: What a pleasant surprise to receive the bed frame in a most compact box! This frame must have received an award for unique design. It was incredibly simple to put together with the easy to follow directions. For an extra bed in our guest room, this twin XL bed frame is just what we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Not for full-time use.
customer_reviews.text: This product did not last a year. The welds broke and the bed collapsed. It was being used by a 5'2" 125lb teenage girl. Perhaps this frame is better suited for rare/occasional use in a spare bedroom. Definitely not durable enough for full time use.
customer_reviews.author: ZooMack

customer_reviews.title: Support Bars Snapped - Hazard
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this bed frame for about 8 months. It’s been fine up until I sat on it the other night, and fell completely through.... it appears the bars under that side of the bed have completely snapped through for no apparent reason. We have reached out to Amazon and the seller directly, and have sent dozens of emails with photos proving the damage. We were promised a replacement about a week ago, but never received any sort of follow up. At this point, this bed frame is a hazard. I’ve been using zinus bed frames since college and never had a problem like this, but obviously quality has gone down. So disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary

customer_reviews.title: 2020 base no longer comes assembled!
customer_reviews.text: When I moved into my two bedroom apartment three years ago I bought two of these smart bases and was thrilled. They came fully assembled, just two pieces to fold out and connect with a couple of bolts for the queen size base (second pic). So when I just moved into a three-bedroom house, I decided to order another smart base. O. M. G. This time as you will see, (first pic) they’ve tried to save a couple bucks by having it completely disassembled in about 100 pieces that I have to now waste my time to attempt to put together securely! I will never order another Zinus product!
customer_reviews.author: Lil MamaKitty

customer_reviews.title: Used six months. Easy to assemble and disassemble, and easy to transport after ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used it for six months and it helped and held good. Easy to assemble and easy to transport after disassembling. Very satisfied with the purchase. I should have bought a bigger size, like Queen, from the beginning. Replaced it for a queen bed after six months.
customer_reviews.author: tejas_nextdoor

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME FIND!!
customer_reviews.text: We are so glad we found this!! I received the package very quickly, even though we were having bad weather. The frame was really easy to put together, and its sturdy enough right now. A couple things didn't quite line up though, so if we push the frame too hard the head of the bed collaspes. However, considering what my man child was sleeping on before, its an improvement. I may just have him take it apart, start over, and see if he did something. If he'll do it, lol. But, right now, for the price point, its getting the job done! AWESOME FIND!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 3 months
customer_reviews.text: This is our second Zinus bedframe in this size. Purchased for a tall and very thin teenage boy who weighs under 160lbs. The first one was purchased refurbished and was not under warranty. It lasted 10 months. The second frame was purchased from Zinus directly and lasted 3 months. Once again a welded spot on the frame failed and broke loose. Perhaps it's the Twin XL size with the flaw, I really don't care. At this point I have to through the hassle of contacting the manufacturer which will probably lead to them wanting to replace it but all I want is a full refund. Now.
customer_reviews.author: TD in FL

customer_reviews.title: Buy it. Sturdy, super easy to assemble, beautiful .
customer_reviews.text: Buy it. Sturdy, super easy to assemble, beautiful . Great price. Just moved back to east TN from California. I only moved my clothes, books and computers. Therefore had no furniture. I surfed through amazon and found this gorgeous frame. Considering the cheap price I was very skeptical about the quality and looks. It arrived on time. It's very easy to assemble, very sturdy, very good looking . The 5 inch gel foam rubber mattress fits perfectly on it. Underneath there is enough space to fit single plastic drawers for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Maia

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy/won’t last
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 frames for my teenage boys. 130-140lbs each. Both frames broke within 6 months. The first time I thought maybe he did something but I witnessed the second one and all he did was roll over. All the do is sleep and lay there when on their phone/laptop. No reason for these to break like they did.
customer_reviews.author: Shadowfax

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and works great
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these and assembly was super simple. So glad I bought this. Don't need the box spring and it is high enough to put storage bins I purchased online. Only thing to note: if you sit on the foot end of the bed and you have a foam mattress, the bed has a tendency to sink in below the edge of the frame. Since this is for sleep and not long distance sitting I can live with that. Also: you def want to consider using the two sided sticky tape. The mattress keeps moving all over the frame without. This company knows that so the two sided sticky tape is already on the frame!
customer_reviews.author: PidePiper80

customer_reviews.title: Just Okay - Don't Work with Headboards
customer_reviews.text: We ordered two of these frames and they are sturdy and hold our mattresses securely....but the brackets that are supposed to work with these frames to attach headboards do not fit properly. We ordered the brackets recommended for use with this frame - but were sent ones that do not fit. We tried to contact Amazon to explain the issue and they refunded us and sent out the same incorrect ones a second time. We had to retrofit them to make them function with the bed frames. If I had to do it again, I would just purchase traditional bedframes and save myself the hassle. I can't recommend these, but they are not awful either.
customer_reviews.author: April Steele

customer_reviews.title: Squeaky frame.
customer_reviews.text: This is our second Zinus frame, and while we loved the first one, this one is too noisy. I’ve tightened the bolts, but the frame still squeaks from any movement. Has negatively impacted extracurricular activities. Sept 2020 Update: After more than a year of a squeaky bed and much lost sleep, we gave up. Wish we had switched sooner, a different model performs as expected and doesn’t make noise every time you roll over. Would recommend folks check out another frame/platform before settling for this noisy contraption.
customer_reviews.author: Dave B.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Great metal frame and pretty sturdy. Height is perfect for my 8 inch mattress. It works well even with a my non-spring mattress because the rungs are pretty close together. Four stars instead of five simply because one of the “extra” legs underneath the bed won’t attach correctly. I did lose one of the rungs while moving it from one room to another and that causes a huge pothole when I accidentally kneel on that area of the bed, so don’t misplace any rungs or you will feel the difference. Assembly was super fast and I could do it alone and the bed is sturdy but lightweight. I love this purchase more than my original traditional bed frame.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Chi

customer_reviews.title: Not Easy!  Zinus Headboard Brackets Don't Work With this Frame
customer_reviews.text: Beware of getting this frame esp from Amazon Warehouse deals. I fell for Used, Very Good to get a frame that came in a million pieces, some pieces that didn't go with the frame and no instructions! Never again! I needed for my mom right away so I couldn't send it back. Thank God my husband and brother in law rigged it up buying some screws from the hardware store to make it work. Oh, by the way the brackets they sale for attaching a headboard don't work with this frame at all! They had to rigged that up too. It was decent and my mom liked after taking about 6hrs to assemble!
customer_reviews.author: KRA1960

customer_reviews.title: This bedframe wins
customer_reviews.text: Assembly: Hubby raved about how this was the easiest thing he's ever put together. Bonus: It came with no ordinary tightener. It came with a kind that we've never seen before and made screwing in the screws the best experience yet. All the pieces were no brainers for where to put them. Plenty of room underneath. Rock solid with mattress on top. Cons: not sure what benefit the taped pieces are good for, i mean, what if I don't want the mattress to stick to those pieces cause I need to lift the mattress?
customer_reviews.author: whocares

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Assembled this guy in about half an hour (with distractions haha!) And only had help at the end with all the slats and then getting the bed on. I had a frame from the matress store and a box spring before. I am not a very tall person. I hated that box spring and frame. The frame would make noise and yeah wheels are cool but we have wood flooring (why in a bedroom? I'll never know) anyway. This base was easy to put together and it feels secure. The "no slip" tape on the middle slats is pretty darn nifty! I also have taller storage with this base than the frame I had, yay!
customer_reviews.author: kellymonster

customer_reviews.title: horrible
customer_reviews.text: I generally don't write reviews and am quite content with the things I buy from amazon - but this was a horrible mistake. We moved recently and so I ordered this- we realized, after our mattress came,that its way bigger than it should be, so there's a gaping hole on one side of the bed- we are afraid that our cats are going to fall through them and get hurt, and of course the bed looks really pathetic. Secondly, the corners stick out so much - both me and my husband got bruises, and just now I got a gash. DO NOT buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Samiarun

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: We replaced a box spring and queen frame at our beach house. Took a chance on this, to our surprise it had great directions and was super easy to assemble. All tools and supplies were included, which was a plus. We were able to use a head board and a dust ruffle! Again another plus!! Our new mattress never felt this good, nice and sturdy, fit the entire mattress. not bouncy, no noise when moving and turning. It is great especially for those with allergies, no extra box spring fabric! Would purchase again and well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: luckygirl

customer_reviews.title: Great product! No more bulky box springs!
customer_reviews.text: This frame is amazing. The box was super heavy but I took that as a good sign. It does take two people to assemble however, but there are plenty of tools provided. There were two pieces I was not sure where they went and found the instructions a bit lacking in explaining them but hopefully I did it right. My bed skirt over the frame adds to the hidden extra storage under the bed as well. My mattress is a lot thicker than most though so the bed does sit pretty high on this, however, with a standard mattress, I am sure it is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Farzetta

customer_reviews.title: NOT so easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this bed frame, especially if you are a female trying to put it together by yourself. A foldable frame would have been much easier. Too many parts and many of them did not fit properly. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila T

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with attaching headboard/footboard
customer_reviews.text: Only ordered because the answer/question stated that you can attach a headboard and footboard. Not true. There are holes, but the design of the frame prevents attaching. Ordered the brackets and they cant be attached to the frame either due to the design of the frame. Wish I had ordered the Amazon Basic frame; it's easier to set up and has the holes to attach the headboard and footboard.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Easy, sturdy, definitely reccomend
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first. Really sturdy though, I have a really thick pillowtop mattress and I weigh about 200lbs. Overall between my weight and my mattresses weight is really solid. If I had a normal sized mattress it would be at a good height. Definitely wouldn't reccomend using a box spring. Also I feel my mattress has more support and doesn't sink in like it would when I was using a box spring and generic bed frame. Totally worth the buy, assembly was easy too.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Economic and functional
customer_reviews.text: Delivery even with Prime took over a week which was annoying. The instructions aren’t worded but it’s very simple to follow the photos. From start to finish it took less than 40 minutes for me assembling alone. It’s quite sturdy and quiet it doesn’t creak and hasn’t needed a tightening. I use both a box spring and mattress because I wanted the extra height. The weight seems to negate any slipping issues others have described. I’m not thrilled with the under storage. There is a bar down the center which is great for support but makes me have to walk from side to side to get to the luggage and bins stored underneath. Overall I’m happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Aphrodite Brown

customer_reviews.title: Flawed design for use with a memory foam mattress
customer_reviews.text: Here's the deal. I like the idea of this bed frame, but a box spring for a memory foam mattress needs a layer of something between the bars to keep the mattress from going through the bars. Right now I have a thin piece of plywood between the frame and the mattress because I got tired of my rib cage pressing into a metal bar.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan N.

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: The package we received must have been a return because the zip ties were cut off just sitting inside the wrapping. We are missing 2 of the rubber pieces to the bottom of the legs and it definitely is not super easy to put together. I think it said it was supposed to take 10 minutes- but it took about 30 minutes. It is also not easy to move once a bed is on it. Other than that, it is a sturdy frame and I like not having a box spring anymore. If the parts were all there I would probably give this 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsie Kristine

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and spacious
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and spacious. It fits my bed well without a box spring and I never heard any squeaking at all. The bottom has plenty of space, so I put storage boxes of my summer clothes underneath at the moment, which I will exchange for my winter clothes once spring came. My mattress tend to slip slightly off the frame if I accidentally bump it, so I would have preferred for there to be some kind of strap included in this base to prevent that, but not a deal-breaker by any mean. The assembly was a pain though and took two people an hour to assemble
customer_reviews.author: P. D.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This is a must buy. Maybe one of the best purchases I have made in my life. Well worth the money. I agree with all the positive reviews. If I had a reason to buy more I would. No squeak whatsoever. Extremely durable...even after my 5 year old jumps on it constantly. Folds up compact. Great for guests. Unbeatable really.
customer_reviews.author: Domgar

customer_reviews.title: Great but needs a non skid/gripper of some sort
customer_reviews.text: Great for price and fits my father in law's needs.. As others have mentioned the new mattress he purchased slid too easily and required adjustments to avoid falling. Another review said she added hot glue on the frame to add some grip. Off to dollar general to get hot glue gun and sticks. I place hot glue over every rung and around edges. Once dried we put mattress back and voila no slipping! Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Davis

customer_reviews.title: Solid short-term bed frame
customer_reviews.text: I've had this frame for roughly two years having used it for a total of 1.5 years due to several moves. One side has significantly sunken in (no more than 230 labs placed on it at any given time), and the screws easily stripped/bent during normal use. However, for $90, it's not bad. It fits my bed, and for a college student it has held up well enough after two deconstructions and three reconstructions.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Q.

customer_reviews.title: NOT easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought a few of these types of foundations. Bought this one because it said "easy to assemble". After 2 hours, I discovered the middle support was missing holes to connect all together. Had to package it up and return. Bought another Zinus and it was a breeze to put together. They need to go back to the drawing board on this one!
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Seems kind of cheap
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my nephew to put his bed on. It was easy to set up. However, seems like cheap metal that will bend easily with weight and movement. The metal has some jagged edges and doesnt have any grooves or anything to help keep the bed on. Being on a slick floor (no carpet) makes the bed and mattress move around a lot when you go to sit on it or get up. Hopefully it doesnt fall apart moving around so much. It definitely needs felt pads or something under the feet.
customer_reviews.author: Blair Burns

customer_reviews.title: too much assembly
customer_reviews.text: My mistake. I thought this was like my other frame where u 'unfold' it and tighten a screw and are good to go. No. This one came with many parts and slats and 12 screws and you have to be able to get down on the floor to assemble it. That is impossible for me so thankfully my daughter put it together. I regret buying this. Wish I had read it more carefully and had seen it was not the other good type of frame.
customer_reviews.author: Grey the Elder

customer_reviews.title: Support beam welded upside down!!
customer_reviews.text: Just like a customer in a previous review one of our pieces in the center part of the frame was welded upside down! No way to remedy and the slats fall straight out of the center support because of one piece that I suppose quality control thought was good enough to ship out to me. Frustrated is not the word. My husband couldn't even believe his eyes. Now to go through the return process and waste more time. I am not the first this has happened to. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Savage

customer_reviews.title: Felt weak
customer_reviews.text: I bought this frame from same brand and different design I think. Somehow other one was much cheaper which was 46 this one was 66. But i dont see the difference. Old one was much easy to assemble and stable. This one is much harder to assemble and feel more weaker.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Discontinued product. Better out there
customer_reviews.text: Received as a used product for full price. No instructions or hardware. Discontinued product! But I'm stuck as no us spec king size ships to my location and it's 50lb!!. I've purchased 2 other frames that we truly toolless, light weight and just as sturdy. This unit required over 12 bolts of 60mm and 30mm as oppose to the other revised models. Still doesn't set all stations to the floor after adjustments.
customer_reviews.author: Luis G.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Durable
customer_reviews.text: I've owned the king size frame for 9 months and I'm very happy with the product. I use this with a 10" foam mattress plus 400lbs load between two people. Never squeaks or slides. Easy to assemble. I love how much storage space this frame opened up for us.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: I needed 2 twin platform frames in a pinch on a budget for my new 2 foster boys. I have to say I was not disappointed! Very good frame and easy to assemble. Delivery was earlier than expected too. They are still in excellent shape with no problems even with very active 8 and 11 year old boys. I put 4 stars because it would of been nicer if it came with a bar to keep the mattress in place better. The mattress doesn't move a lot but from time to time, it does need to be adjusted. Otherwise, I'm completely happy with this product and the price!
customer_reviews.author: Tara Perez

customer_reviews.title: excellent frame, easy storage
customer_reviews.text: Love this frame. Bought it for a room used as an overflow guest room intending to break down beds when not in use. The slats pop out quickly and the frame folds compactly and fits in the back of the closet. Very sturdy. Works so well we left them when we converted the room to permanent guest room. Bought the brackets (had to add a little 1/2 by 1" strip of wood to fill in at head of bed, no problem) and bought an inexpensive headboard, looks great. We like these frames so much I bought another to use as a "cot" in the den for overflow family events. Well packaged, wonderful instructions. Happy camper all around.
customer_reviews.author: laker

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy. If I needed another one I would buy this one.
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking to get pissed and break things out of frustration than you should not buy this bed frame. It was the easiest and well thought out bed frame I've ever assembled. I mean they sent a Allen wrench ratchet so you didn't have to keep turning a standard L wrench. I put that bad boy in my tool box I liked it so much. There is no regret in buying this bed frame. It seems sturdy and does not wobble at all. I'll be looking at more Zinus products in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: It seems sturdy enough for the price. A downside for me: I live in an older home where I think the wood floors aren't perfectly flat from one corner to another, so any movement I make while laying in bed with this frame results in creeking and popping sounds. I haven't been able to come up with a way to get it to stop. I think this frame would maybe do better on carpet.
customer_reviews.author: J.D.

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent instructions and hardware included
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I love Zinus products and have had good experiences with their bedframes. My Zinus queen smartframe has lasted over a year now and is fully supportive with no issues or signs of wear. It came with appropriate hardware. However, I just purchased this twin XL smartframe and it did not come with any hardware or instructions. I called Zinus customer support and they have a line specifically for orders that arrive with missing pieces or parts, which tells me this is a common issue. They will ship out the missing instructions and hardware for free, but it will take some additional time to arrive.
customer_reviews.author: mysticalbeth

customer_reviews.title: Taped down ? Who knew?
customer_reviews.text: Matress does not seem that secure because there are no sides. They give you "taped" middle slotted bars but I'm not sure I want my matress taped down. How am I then supposed to get a dust ruffle on or move the matress for vacuuming?
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Graham

customer_reviews.title: Mattress slides
customer_reviews.text: Frames is sturdy and easy to assemble as advertised, but the biggest problem that you don't have with traditional frames is the mattress slides. You have to purchase a non slip mattress pad to prevent this. It would be better if the product came with something to prevent the mattress from sliding or was designed with a lip or edge to prevent mattress from sliding. As is without something to prevent mattress from sliding the product is worthless.
customer_reviews.author: otis c. tanner

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars on ability to assemble. I am a single women and it should not stop you either. It was a fun project that took 25 minutes and voila! It was ready for my mattress. It has room under neath, if you have things to store under you bed too. (smaller height totes would work) Looks even better when your bed skirt is on. I watched the video link before hand which is a good idea to see each step of assembly. All the screws and little screw tightener tools are included. You've got this! The price for what I got is fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Good so far, careful on step number 3
customer_reviews.text: I am somewhat of a handyman and this bed frame took me about 30 minutes to assemble. It was very easy. I have been sleeping on it for the last couple days and have not had any issues with stability. Be sure to use the socket set on step number 3 to fully tighten the screws. You cannot achieve full tightness without using the socket set even though it may seem that way.
customer_reviews.author: Customer Service

customer_reviews.title: Freaking awesome
customer_reviews.text: My first suggestion to you is watch the video on how to put it together that is here on Amazon. The instructions are vague and just odd it took a minute to understand what was going on but the video made it so much more simple and once it's fully put together it's quite portable. it's super sturdy, I flipping love this! it has the adhesive strips so your mattress doesn't slide so nice to have I would recommend this to anybody I absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: FuzyArtist

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with headboard
customer_reviews.text: Love the concept of a “ no boxspring “base , however, my intent was to use with a headboard. Amazon showed brackets that were compatible so I purchased. Did not fit. I then called zinus customer service since their website clearly states in the Q&A section that all bases are compatible with headboards. Customer service rep said they were not. Another customer service rep emailed me and said they were. Bottom line? This base doesn’t work with a headboard. Amazon refunded my money for brackets. Not their fault. Manufacturer does not give correct detail .
customer_reviews.author: Maribeth Herbert

customer_reviews.title: The best part about this frame is there is not noise ...
customer_reviews.text: I had just moved when I ordered this product. The box arrived straight to my door. Assembly was not difficult at all. It is quite a bit of piece involve however no equipment such as screwdrivers are needed. It comes with everything you need for assembly. It took about 10 mins to assemble. The best part about this frame is there is not noise or squeaks when moving around on it. It is sturdy and durable. IT seems that it will last a long while. I have had it for about a week and I am in love. Considering buying a second for my other bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Quick fix in a situation.
customer_reviews.text: I did not like that all the parts were separate. I am not good at putting objects together. Bought this frame because my grandmother was coming home from the hospital and I needed ad additional bed in the room she would be staying in.I already had the mattress and a box spring. Bed was high enough for my liking. It was simple enough when I got the hang of it. I did not like the part where if I grabbed the frame by the slats, they would come out of the slots. but, the you just learned to pick up or move the frame a better way.
customer_reviews.author: craft pro

customer_reviews.title: It fell apart within 2 years
customer_reviews.text: I bought this twin xl frame for a spare bed. Then I had a 350 pound house guest that stayed 14 months using it. It fell apart in a year after of everyday use. The last two months the guest stayed the mattress was on the floor. The company said it's rated at 1200 pounds. I think not. I still have not replaced it but I will be looking at a much sturdier type of frame than this.
customer_reviews.author: Dina Knight

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I'm six foot five I weigh 250 pounds this is a very sturdy frame. I love it. It took me probably 20 minutes from the time I got the box until I had it set up. This should be fairly simple to put together for most people. They actually give you two different tools to put this together and Allen wrench and then a hex head with a little ratchet wrench my suggestion is snug them up with a little ratchet wrench and then tighten them with the Allen wrench. the ratchet wrench isn't super strong.
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: Buy this frame ASAP if you need a new foundation
customer_reviews.text: I was having a ton of issues with my four poster bed. The plywood and legs it came with broke. I tried building my own with no luck. Finally I bought this. I had to take one of the side panels off my bed to get it to fit, but I was just exhausted from trying to sleep on a bed with a messed up foundation. This saved my bed and my sleep, I just regret not getting it sooner. It has held up great so far and no issues. I’ve had it for several months now
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Listen to my review....this is great.
customer_reviews.text: I just assembled this frame for a king size bed. It took me about 45 mins because I’m lazy and took my time. Instructions were simple. I am 354lbs and it’s not squeaking which is great. When I added my king size mattress on top it gave my bed great height. I am happy with this so far. I will update my review in a couple months seeing how people say it falls apart - but all the pieces were since and sturdy so I don’t think I’ll see that problem.
customer_reviews.author: Kt mueller

customer_reviews.title: Fantabulous
customer_reviews.text: Was beyond easy to assemble. This means a lot to me because the last bed frame I had to assemble from IKEA literally made me want to slit my own throat. Worst day of my life. This frame is sturdy, no squeakiness, and supportive. I love the height, I cant put whatever I want underneath, but for now it will act as the cat cave my kid and puppy like to intrude. So satisfied, totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: bree

customer_reviews.title: however it was easy enough to put together
customer_reviews.text: This came in a lot more pieces than I was expecting, however it was easy enough to put together. The height is good and it seems very sturdy. My only issue is the fact that there is nothing holding the mattress on the frame. The bars are so slippery that we have to get into bed very carefully to avoid the bed sliding 4 or 5 inches in the opposite direction. I had to purchase a roll of the rubber material to put on the slats and it helps to keep the mattress in place better. If I had known that this would be an issue, I would not have ordered this bed frame.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea G.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I like the height of this bed frame but we bought it go with a 10 inch line spa mattress through amazon (LOVE the mattress) but think it needs a sturdier bed frame. The 8 inch mattress we bought for a twin bunk bed feels like it is studier than the 10 inch queen we have to go with this frame. I think it needs more slats or something but overall it works well for our camp!
customer_reviews.author: JLP22

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: This bed frame was extremely easy to assemble. I was able to put it together, by myself in less than an hour. Once it was completely put together, it looks very nice. (Not that you will see it once you have a mattress on it.) The instructions are all pictures, which ended up being enough information for me to assemble. But I would have liked the instructions to have pictures for reference and words to explain. Over all this is a very good frame and won't break the bank. I would highly recommend this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Small

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: It is not hard to assemble but did take some time. Seems very sturdy. Would definitely recommend using some furniture corner guards on the corners - which are super sharp and would bang up a leg pretty good if you were to run into one in the middle of the night! Definitely a nice less expensive option for raising the bed off the ground while adding some storage underneath!
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: So far so great!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these platform bases in twin xl to replace the old broken down box springs of my king size bed. I set them up yesterday and the set up was so easy!! They included a little bonus ratchet that made the job go so quick! They seem very sturdy and make no noise at all when my husband and I move around on them. We have only slept on them for one night but so far so great!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor product with poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: Don't get this frame, there are 3 supports that connect each pair of legs. After about a year the welding on the supports wore out and they collapsed at the L where they're bolted to the legs. I assume this happens to a majority of customers since I weigh about 200 lbs. I also tried to get in touch with the manufacturer after Amazon helped me send them an email and there was no response. Following this I waited on hold for over 45 mins and left a voicemail as well. Poor product with poor customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Assembly NOT what I thought or wanted!
customer_reviews.text: While I think this is a pretty sturdy frame, the assembly was not what I thought I was ordering. I wanted the two section frame that easily unfolds and is connected by a few screws and wing nuts....this is not! I highly RECOMMEND watching the video provided (I didn't of course) to see just how to assemble. The instructions were easy to follow until you get to Part H, you have to unscrew the two screws and slide a section over the frame. It took me about 1/2 hr to figure that out. I would not order this frame again because of the assembly. I'm older with COPD and this was honestly a challenge for me.
customer_reviews.author: agoff710

customer_reviews.title: NOT EASY TO ASSEMBLE
customer_reviews.text: NOT EASY to Assemble.. i Had issues with shipping at first, package was late about 4-5 days, since i needed right away, i borrowed another one, now finally i assembled this, intealized it a Pain to mount.. unfortunately, its over 30 days and seems like i cannot return it.. but i can leave this review that will help others not to make same mistake i made.. DONT BUY IT if you need something easy to use..
customer_reviews.author: Rosa N

customer_reviews.title: Super sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Good price for a solid base. Easy to assemble. Very sturdy doesn't creak or wobble even with a couple of adults sitting on it. One thing I noticed while putting it together 2 bars are equipment with machined holes for head/footboards so make sure you use those first and last. Edit: a few months have passed and it's still good as the day I assembled it. My son even jumps on it. This frame is a rock! 100% recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hook

customer_reviews.title: Easy, Fun, and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: One of my most favorite purchases from Amazon! This company is quality! I’ve never purchased any product that I had to assemble myself that compares with the high quality of this bedframe. Everything from the packaging, instructions to the final product are top notch. It is clear that these folks did their homework in engineering this product and it made for one of the most fun and satisfying assembly projects I’ve ever done! Great project great job!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Clyde

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this for use in our extra room. It arrived very quickly, and was easy enough to put together. So far it is doing the job, and seems to be very comfortable, and we just have a "cheapy" spring mattress with a topper. The only problem I have with it (hence 4 stars rather than 5), is that the mattress can slide off because the design does not include "stops" on the corners or sides. We remedied this by using the stuff you put under rugs on hardwood floors (rug gripper I guess??), and that has solved the problem. Worth the few extra bucks to avoid sliding around. Overall, a good product and a great price.
customer_reviews.author: XU Fan

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but too expensive
customer_reviews.text: *** They significantly raised the price of this product right after I bought it. I would just get the AmazonBasic one instead unless it lowers back to what it was. *** Good product, quality parts, easy to put together, no missing pieces. For those worried about mattress sliding, this product has a very sticky "tape" on 8 of the support bars and that will keep it in place. Once all the pieces are together it's impressively solid. If you're a heavy human significantly above your recommended weight range, or a couple of said heavy humans, this product is not for you.
customer_reviews.author: Jaden

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product and price
customer_reviews.text: My i- comfort is over 3 years old and it's like a new mattress, perfect for my king bed.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Great cheap frame
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase, we needed something cheap to replace our sons old bed frame...and this was perfect..it was super easy to out together and to moe and it's pretty sturdy, even after having a 12 year old and 6 year old jump on it! It does have double le sided tape on 4 of the bars which is nice so it won't let the mattress slip... bonus!!
customer_reviews.author: NostalgiaGamer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: So easy to assemble. It is low to the ground, I used only a mattress no box spring. This was for my daughters who are 4 and 5. Perfect size for them. I cold easily add risers or a box spring to add some height when they get older. The only problem Im having is that the mattress slides off of it easily and it seems a little big for a queen size mattress. I’m afraid we may be hitting our shins on it but that hasn’t happened yet. All in all I’d say it was a great buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: LainaO

customer_reviews.title: I paid full price, returned with the box unopened and was charged almost $17.00 to return the item
customer_reviews.text: It was for a van conversion but would not work after checking specs. Got a partial refund as a credit on my credit card and with Prime, I was still charged a fee that I don't even know what I am paying for. I have another of the same item but for a queen size bed and it is perfect. Esp when the boxspring would not fit up the staircase.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Bredon

customer_reviews.title: Built to last, worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Let me tell you. This is defiantly built to last. Bought this platform summer 2017 and it held up strong. We use ir with a memory foam bob o pedic matress. My brother is a big guy (we're talking 600+) and this is the only frame we've had that hasn't given up after a year. Worth every penny and when it does finely go caput I will be getting another. A few times there was 1000+ lbs being supported by this frame with zero give.
customer_reviews.author: Hay

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, sturdy frame, everything locks in place! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Very impressed with this affordable solution. Had a (foam) mattress without a box spring, had a guest coming, needed a bed for the guest room. Ordered this! * Arrived quickly * Was easy to assemble * Bed feels very sturdy! * It has no wooden slats sliding around and falling off - all metal bars locked in place! Report after first night of sleep on it was great!
customer_reviews.author: dbiz

customer_reviews.title: Works great for a cheap alternative to a box spring
customer_reviews.text: Works great for a cheap alternative to a box spring, however, I have banged my shins on the corners countless times and pretty much have a scrape there all the time now. Mattresses just don't cover those corners. It is also hard to tuck the sheets without using a traditional box spring. I have thought of adding a box spring on top of this, but that might make the bed a bit high. Overall, it's very sturdy and was very easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Knieper

customer_reviews.title: Great quality just time consuming to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Takes a while to assemble. We had a queen bed frame from a different brand before buying this king size and the queen one was so easy all you did was unfold the sides and lock them together and it was just as sturdy as this one. So I feel like they could make it a bit easier to assemble but maybe thats how they keep the price lower. Once it's together it seems sturdy and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: candyce

customer_reviews.title: What happened?
customer_reviews.text: Feeling extremely played. The box came today I can already tell from how it was packaged something was off ,when I do open the box part's are missing no instructions.. This is sad
customer_reviews.author: shorlan

customer_reviews.title: Used mess...
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t have even given this 1 star... but that is not an option. I have returned this as the box had a hole and very badly taped up when I got it. All of the parts were rattling in the box... open box and try to put together and all the pieces have weird double sided tape on them or something sticky... and there were literally only 4 screws and it needed like 12+... I noticed later that there was a sticker on the box saying buying this product gave it new life or something... had I known it was used/missing pieces I WOULDN'T HAVE BOUGHT IT!! So frustrating!!
customer_reviews.author: Nickie

customer_reviews.title: Not fancy, but good.
customer_reviews.text: Yeah, the mattress slides. Put some grippy thingies on the bars and it should be fine. It doesn't slide enough to be a huge downside anyway though. Super easy to put together, I'm pregnant with somewhat limited mobility and it took me 20 mins to put it together on my own. It holds at least 225 lbs without any worry at all. Its sturdy. My 6 year old loves it, and his dog loves that there's plenty of room for him to sleep under it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi

customer_reviews.title: Great solo - not with headboard attachment.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and overall, easy to put together. I purchased with the corner pieces to attach a headboard. These pieces did not fit on easily at all (almost like two different brands, etc.) and the headboard had to be finagled a bit to fit on. Mostly because the corner pieces did not fit right to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: Gimster Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Amazon basics version much better
customer_reviews.text: This frame is just "okay", not great. The cross bars are too far apart, causing the mattress to sag between the bars. It needs some sort of support running in the other direction to keep the mattress from sagging. (like the Amazon basics frames) Also, when moving the frame around, the crossbars have a tendency to fall out, as they don't lock in place.
customer_reviews.author: Techno Nerd

customer_reviews.title: Great frame!
customer_reviews.text: I have a bad back so I order different foam density and different thickness size foam mattresses, I’ve made the perfect mattress. This frame fits the spot I sleep like it was made for it. It is very sturdy and nothing has come loose. I’m 300- 325. Frame does not make much noise when I move around. This was a great buy for me.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Luna

customer_reviews.title: Quick and Easy Assembley
customer_reviews.text: Arrived early and it great shape. Took about 20 minutes to assemble and is sturdy. The design is perfect so you don't hit your shins getting in and out of bed. Perfect fit for my memory foam bed without a boxspring. Could not believe the cost being low and to get this premium of a frame that doesn't normally happen! Thank You so much!
customer_reviews.author: Denney Rush

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great alternative to a box spring. Sturdy and easy to assemble but it will take time. I bought a pool noodle and cut it to about every 6" to place around the metal bottom corners to protect my feet. It comes with tape to be remove so that the bed will stick to the frame and not move but we didn't remove the adhesive and so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: GATUPR

customer_reviews.title: Second Time’s a Charm
customer_reviews.text: The Zinus platform is sturdy and well made on the second try. The first product arrived damaged. It was not welded together at some joints and the metal was bent. I called Zinus for a replacement and they promptly passed me to Amazon bc I was told Amazon Prime would handles the return. I received great customer service from both Zinus and Amazon CSRs, explained the problem with the platform and the replacement arrived in two days.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: It's Solid
customer_reviews.text: I like this bed frame. We now have 2 Zinius bed frames. The single is a lot easier to put together than the queen. The queen bed takes some time but not too hard. So far it holds up well with mattress and box spring. The only issue I have is I wish it was a little higher so we could put bigger boxes for storage underneath, but we can still store things.
customer_reviews.author: Nikkita

customer_reviews.title: They need to get a better welder.- Great company replaced the bed frame.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son and the welding has already started to break, broke before it was a year old. They need to get a better welder. Ok originally gave this a 2 star. Because it broke after less than a year, but the company contacted me, and told me they have a warranty, so smooth, took pictures of the frame and he got his new frame yesterday. Very nice didn't have to fight to get a new frame. Great company very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Pearl's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 16 monthes and I'm 140
customer_reviews.text: Breaks in 16 months, two of the three lower horizontal support gave up. Now I have to buy this one again to get replacement parts since I don't have enough space to assemble another frame. I'm like 140 pounds and I use it with a rather light mattress. Stay clear, don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: Alxender

customer_reviews.title: Not as high as I thought
customer_reviews.text: I got my bedframe not too long ago. The packaging luckily wasn't too damaged so I guess I got lucky there. All the pieces were accounted for (with a few extra spares) and was easy to put together. I'm a small girl so it took some time for me to set up the longer pieces but I was able to do it all by myself. Pretty sturdy. I had my dad put some boards down just in case cause I've heard of people having sagging mattresses. Overall good purchase! Though I do with I went with the 18" height as opposed to the 14".
customer_reviews.author: Aya Lanell

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK WITH HEADBOARD BRACKETS
customer_reviews.text: I've bought other Zinus smartbase bed frames and they work great, easy to assemble, don't squeak, etc. I think this one is an older model so it requires manual assembly (versus snap) and, most importantly, IT DOES NOT WORK WITH THE ZINUS HEADBOARD BRACKETS. If you look closely (which I obviously didn't), the corners are not rounded evenly, so the smartbase brackets do not fit onto the frame. If you want a mounted headboard, this is not the frame for you. Will be returning for a different model.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: good for the price
customer_reviews.text: The instruction was easy to follow and did not take too long. The material is not bad, good for its price, but don't expect very high quality product. Also, it is taller than expected after assembly, so consider getting it only if you need under the bed storage space, otherwise needs to to use bed skirt to make it look nice
customer_reviews.author: Trani

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: Performs exactly as wanted. We have plenty of room underneath for storage boxes (always helpful). Good value. If I could change anything, I would like the corners to be more rounded. We bought some of those corner guards for babyproofing and it solves the problem. But really, it could be addressed by manufacturing changes.
customer_reviews.author: R. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Not so "easy" assembly. But it's assembled now.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a sleeptune for myself, and that was easy see up. Out of the box, snap it in place. I bought this zinus for my son, and assembly wasn't "easy." It wasn't difficult, but I wouldn't call it easy. So far, it's sturdy and my son loves the fact he can store his toys under it. I love the fact that I don't need a box spring. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Raych

customer_reviews.title: I’m glad I bought this!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy because this was EXTREMELY easy to assemble. And trust me as a single mom fixing up my little place with all kinds of furniture...I know complicated and frustrating assembly believe me! I bought this frame for my almost 4 year old as his first official big guy bed and it fits perfect with a standard twin size bed I purchased off of amazon as well. I now get my queen sized bed to myself again, little man gets his nice new bed, we’re both winning. Money very well spent. Thankyou!
customer_reviews.author: Nessa D

customer_reviews.title: I bought the Amazon Basics queen size and love it. Then I bought this Zinus in twin ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Amazon Basics queen size and love it. Then I bought this Zinus in twin size, and wish I had waited for the back-ordered Amazon Basics instead. This one was FAR harder to put together, and there are no supports running lengthwise, so the end of the new hybrid (springs + foam) mattress just falls through at the ends. Had to put plywood under the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: M. D.

customer_reviews.title: Nice twin box spring.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my spare room when my dad visits. You do have to assemble this product, but it's not hard. I wouldn't take it apart to store as it would be tiring to have to put it together everytime to use it. It is very sturdy and comfortable. No boxspring needed!
customer_reviews.author: Lis

customer_reviews.title: I have to laugh when it says easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: This is very difficult to assemble if you are alone, you need someone to hold the parts in place so it was not easy to do it alone, I actually thought I was ordering the other frame that folds out but I made a mistake and when I opened the box and all these parts came out and I knew I was in trouble. The instructions are just pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Billy K

product_meta.title: Zinus Dawn 14 Inch Easy To Assemble SmartBase Mattress Foundation / Platform Bed Frame / Box Spring Replacement, Twin
product_meta.description: Size:Twin| Style:Bed Frame OnlyThe Easy to Assemble SmartBase is an innovative mattress foundation by Zinus. No need for a box spring and a traditional frame, enjoy strong, sturdy support for your spring, memory foam, or latex mattress with the Easy to Assemble SmartBase. The Easy to Assemble SmartBase provides strong steel support, easy setup and 12.5 inches of clearance for under bed storage. Worry free 5 year limited warranty. Another comfort innovation from Zinus. Pioneering comfort.
feature_bullets: 14 inches high with 12.5 inches of Clearance under the frame for valuable under bed storage space
Eliminates the Need for a traditional box Spring and bed frame
Compact design allows for tight spaces such as staircases and doorways
Multiple points of contact to the floor for level support / Sturdy Steel structure protects your mattress by providing strong level support
Requires the use of SmartBase headboard brackets to connect to a headboard

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars6,068 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
